Just got back from Barcelona for work and met my boss and some coworkers at Bar Mut for dinner.  I had no idea what I was getting into.  I was treated, thus did not see the tab so this review is solely based on the experience and food.  First off, we were a party of 8, the only English speakers, and comprised roughly half of the entire establishment.  I was barraged with every tapas on the menu, numerous bottles of French and Spanish wines.  The whole experience was incredible and this was hands down one of the best meals I've had in my life.  Some of the highlights included Oxtail in marrow sauce, beef fillet with foie gras, shrimp in egg garlic sauce topped with micro shoestring potatoes.  The environment itself is very non-pretentious and quaint.  This was exactly what I had in my mind as a little Spanish tapas bar.  So if you are in Barcelona, make a reservation, and enjoy!
